billing_autorenew_enable_title: Enable automatic renewal for the services selected
billing_autorenew_enable_payment_mean: Once you have set up automatic renewal for the services selected, the payment method used will be your default payment method, i.e.: {{ type }} {{ label }}
billing_autorenew_enable_payment_mean_de: To change your default payment method, go to the “My payment methods” section
billing_autorenew_enable_payment_mean_fr: The payment frequency will be configured with the maximum frequency possible per service.
billing_autorenew_enable_bulk_unavailabl: Automatic renewal will be enabled for all of the services selected, excluding {{ count }} services:
Automatic renewal will be enabled for all of the services selected, excluding 1 service:
billing_autorenew_enable_bulk: Automatic renewal will be enabled for all of the services selected
billing_autorenew_enable_bulk_single: Automatic renewal for the {{ serviceName }} service will be enabled
billing_autorenew_enable_success: The service renewals have been updated
billing_autorenew_enable_error: An error has occurred enabling automatic renewal {{ message }}
